Articles.Content:
So one day I booted KSP and started playing I don't do a lot of planes but I wanted to do one so I started building and when I tested it it started jumping a lot and I couldn't fix it
My mods are purely visual: EVE, spectra, Distant object enhancment and TUFX
Might be an issue with your landing gear suspension. Enable advanced tweakables, override the spring/damper settings and turn spring strength down on the wheels that are jumping.
